messages.content: Help me find nice activities for me and my wife to do on our holidays for the last week of August 2023, we are in Lille France want to stay local,we like personal development and growth. You don't need to book, just find lists of events and activities, we live here so no hotels needed either.

For this 2023 season, the Gare Saint Sauveur is hosting an exhibition that will delight young and old alike. Tidy up your room! is a proposal by the artist Jean-François Fourtou, a regular visitor to the major seasons of lille3000 (The house that fell from the sky during Fantastic in 2012 ...

Valérie Belin (born in 1964) is an exceptional artist with an international reputation. She is honoured in this new exhibition of around one hundred photographs from the 1990s to the present day, the first large-scale retrospective event. Handling black and white as well as colour, po...

OPEN MUSEUM #8 VIDEO GAMES
From Thursday 13 April to Monday 25 September 2023
Every day except Tuesday
Ankama and Spider's studios are at the Palais des Beaux-Arts for the 8th Open Museum dedicated to video games. Video games in a museum, a strange idea you might say. That's the whole idea of the Open Museum: a carte blanche involving a personality or a genre that you wouldn't expect to...

EXHIBITION "OCRE PASSION"
From Sunday 11 June to Sunday 10 September 2023
Saturday, Sunday
14:00 to 18:00
This summer, the Centre d'Art Sacré de Lille is pleased to exhibit, once again, the work Hugo LARUELLE created in 2017, during LES NUITS DE LA CRYPTE. In his paintings, drawings or photographs, Hugo LARUELLE questions the portrait, the elements that constitute the physical identity, t...

LILLE FLEA MARKET
From Saturday 02 to Sunday 03 September 2023
THE GRANDE BRADERIE DE LILLE: AN EVENT NOT TO BE MISSED Like every first weekend in September, Europe's biggest flea market is back in 2023 to thrill you in the streets of Lille! The Braderie de Lille is the city's flagship event, with over 10,000 stallholders selling antiques, toys, ...

RUGBY WORLD CUP 2023
From Friday 08 September to Saturday 28 October 2023
Every day
This year, France has been selected to host the Rugby World Cup 2023. Come and discover the world of rugby through five matches to be played in Lille's stadiums.  The Rugby World Cup is one of the most prestigious events in the sporting world, attracting millions of spectators from all ...

FESTIVAL BAL - BIÈRE À LILLE
From Sunday 17 to Sunday 24 September 2023
Every day
BAL - Bière à Lille (Beer in Lille) is the first beer & culture festival in the Lille area. Many events will take place in bars, restaurants & public places, making great connections between beer & heritage, gastronomy & culture. Because the image of beer changes, because Lille is and ...
DETAILS

Certainly! Here are some events and activities taking place in Lille during the last week of August 2023:

1. **LILLE AVENTURE NATURE**
   - Date: From Saturday 08 July to Friday 18 August 2023
   - Description: An outdoor nature adventure.
   - [Details](https://en.lilletourism.com/)

2. **LILLE CLEF DE SOLEIL FESTIVAL**
   - Date: From Thursday 06 July to Sunday 20 August 2023
   - Description: A celebration of the diversity of the classical genre. Venues such as the Church of Sainte Marie Madeleine and the Church of the Sacré Coeur will host unique performances.
   - [Details](https://en.lilletourism.com/)

3. **EXPOSITION PHILIPPE HOLLEVOUT À L'HOSPICE COMTESSE**
   - Date: From Friday 16 June to Sunday 17 September 2023 (except Tuesday)
   - Time: 10:00 to 18:00
   - [Details](https://en.lilletourism.com/)

4. **Tidy up your room! Jean françois Fourtou - Gare St Sauveur**
   - Date: From Wednesday 12 April to Sunday 08 October 2023
   - Time: 12:00 to 19:00
   - Description: An exhibition hosted by Gare Saint Sauveur that will delight both young and old.
   - [Details](https://en.lilletourism.com/)

5. **Valérie Belin. The Uncertain Beauty of the World - MUBA**
   - Date: From Friday 17 March to Sunday 27 August 2023
   - Time: 13:00 to 18:00
   - Description: An exhibition of around one hundred photographs from the 1990s to the present day.
   - [Details](https://en.lilletourism.com/)

6. **OPEN MUSEUM #8 VIDEO GAMES**
   - Date: From Thursday 13 April to Monday 25 September 2023 (except Tuesday)
   - Description: Ankama and Spider's studios present the 8th Open Museum dedicated to video games at the Palais des Beaux-Arts.
   - [Details](https://en.lilletourism.com/)

7. **EXHIBITION "OCRE PASSION"**
   - Date: From Sunday 11 June to Sunday 10 September 2023
   - Time: 14:00 to 18:00
   - Description: An exhibition showcasing the work of Hugo LARUELLE created in 2017.
   - [Details](https://en.lilletourism.com/)

8. **LILLE FLEA MARKET**
   - Date: From Saturday 02 to Sunday 03 September 2023
   - Description: Europe's biggest flea market is back in 2023, with over 10,000 stallholders selling antiques, toys, and more.
   - [Details](https://en.lilletourism.com/)

9. **RUGBY WORLD CUP 2023**
   - Date: From Friday 08 September to Saturday 28 October 2023
   - Description: France hosts the Rugby World Cup 2023 with five matches to be played in Lille's stadiums.
   - [Details](https://en.lilletourism.com/)

10. **FESTIVAL BAL - BIÈRE À LILLE**
   - Date: From Sunday 17 to Sunday 24 September 2023
   - Description: The first beer & culture festival in the Lille area, connecting beer with heritage, gastronomy, and culture.
   - [Details](https://en.lilletourism.com/)

I hope you find these suggestions helpful for your holidays! Enjoy your time in Lille!
